strapiEvent.name: Golftoberfest
strapiEvent.organization: Single Parent Scholarship Fund of NWA
strapiEvent.location: Gator Golf in Fayetteville and Golf Mountain in Lowell
strapiEvent.description:
Golftoberfest is NWAâ€™s ORIGINAL Mini-Golf Tourney! Golftoberfest is a family-friendly event where SPSFNWA recipients and their families are also invited to participate. 

Golftoberfest is a great way to encourage your family, friends, and co-workers to get out and play for a good cause. Held at Gator Golf in Fayetteville and Golf Mountain in Lowell, this two-week event gives you the opportunity to go play at a time of your choosing!

October 7th To 22nd


Corporate sponsorships ARE still available! Contact Steven Hinds, Senior Director of Corporate Giving, at 479.254.8550 ext. 103 or steven@spsfnwa.org.
